scenarios.name: Broken Bracket
questions: Help! My bracket just broke off!
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Stay calm, not urgent, schedule repair in 1-2 days, temporary wax solution

scenarios.name: Severe Pain
questions: I'm in really bad pain from my braces!
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Sympathetic, ask about type of pain, offer same-day appointment or immediate callback

scenarios.name: Poking Wire
questions: There's a wire poking my cheek and it hurts!
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Offer immediate relief tips, schedule repair appointment

scenarios.name: Lost Aligner
questions: I lost my Invisalign aligner! What do I do?
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Use previous aligner, call to order replacement, don't skip ahead

scenarios.name: Swollen Gums
questions: My gums are really swollen around my braces.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Rinse with salt water, schedule cleaning appointment, check oral hygiene

scenarios.name: Loose Bands
questions: My rubber bands keep falling off.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Schedule replacement appointment, explain importance of compliance

scenarios.name: Request Human
questions: I'd like to speak with a real person, please.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Polite acknowledgment, offer to help first or transfer, take callback information

scenarios.name: Complex Billing Question
questions: I have a question about my bill that's very complicated.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Acknowledge complexity, offer to transfer to billing specialist

scenarios.name: Complaint About Treatment
questions: I'm not happy with how my treatment is going.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Show empathy, offer to transfer to doctor or manager

scenarios.name: Medical Emergency
questions: I think I'm having a medical emergency related to my braces!
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Immediate escalation, provide emergency contact, stay on line

scenarios.name: Technical Questions
questions: I have a very technical question about my treatment that only a doctor can answer.
scenarios.expectedBehavior: Acknowledge limitation, offer to transfer to doctor
